price: 97. Nabii Ibraahim Yaabah keenik yeyse waqdi, tokkel kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh xiso kaah xisaay jaciim deqsitta girát kaa gasiya (qambisa) iyyen.
arabic: قَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ لَهُۥ بُنۡيَٰنٗا فَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū ib'nū lahu bun'yānan fa-alqūhu fī al-jaḥīmi
